DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine overall survival patient locally advance non-metastatic pancreatic adenocarcinoma treat gemcitabine , fluorouracil , radiotherapy . - Determine time progression patient treat regimen . - Determine overall clinical response patient treat regimen . - Determine toxicity regimen patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute weekly fluorouracil IV continuously day 1-5 weekly 6 week . Patients concurrently undergo radiotherapy 5 day week 6 week . Three week completion chemoradiotherapy , patient receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute weekly week 1-3 . Treatment repeat every 4 week total 4 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 2 month 1 year every 3 month 2 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 78 patient accrue study within 24 month .
